get_versions

Source: R/zen4R_versioning.R
get_versions.Rd

get_versions allows to execute a workflow

get_versions(doi, logger = NULL)

Arguments

doi

a Zenodo DOI or concept DOI

logger

a logger to print messages. The logger can be either NULL, "INFO" (with minimum logs), or "DEBUG" (for complete curl http calls logs)

Value

an object of class data.frame giving the record versions including date, version number and version-specific DOI.

Examples

# \dontrun{
get_versions("10.5281/zenodo.2547036")
#>                created       date  version                    doi
#> 1  2019-01-22 22:44:30 2019-01-22 0.1-beta 10.5281/zenodo.2547037
#> 2  2019-06-04 12:47:55 2019-06-03      0.1 10.5281/zenodo.3238351
#> 3  2019-08-02 08:38:03 2019-08-02      0.2 10.5281/zenodo.3358590
#> 4  2019-08-27 12:07:00 2019-08-27      0.3 10.5281/zenodo.3378733
#> 5  2020-09-02 08:48:36 2020-09-02      0.4 10.5281/zenodo.4011667
#> 6  2020-09-03 10:59:46 2020-09-03    0.4-1 10.5281/zenodo.4013362
#> 7  2020-09-07 06:23:18 2020-09-04    0.4-2 10.5281/zenodo.4017156
#> 8  2021-09-15 12:58:02 2021-09-15      0.5 10.5281/zenodo.5509954
#> 9  2021-10-29 17:40:04 2021-10-29    0.5-1 10.5281/zenodo.5619381
#> 10 2021-11-30 07:59:59 2021-11-30    0.5-2 10.5281/zenodo.5741143
#> 11 2022-02-16 16:33:18 2022-02-16    0.5-3 10.5281/zenodo.6109137
#> 12 2022-05-01 14:35:42 2022-05-01      0.6 10.5281/zenodo.6509945
#> 13 2022-06-17 11:23:00 2022-06-17    0.6-1 10.5281/zenodo.6656251
#> 14 2022-08-19 08:03:38 2022-08-19      0.7 10.5281/zenodo.7009208
#> 15 2023-01-09 23:10:23 2023-01-09    0.7-1 10.5281/zenodo.7517728
#> 16 2023-01-19 18:44:58 2023-01-19      0.8 10.5281/zenodo.7552287
